com.googlecode.array4j
Interface FloatMatrix

All Superinterfaces:
Matrix, java.io.Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
FloatDenseMatrix, FloatDenseVector, FloatPackedMatrix, FloatVector
public interface FloatMatrix
extends Matrix

Single-precision floating point matrix.
